document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 170''' was released in September of 2009 in online format only. It contained the following article related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Monument of the Ancients.Characters: :[[Anivar Daoran]], [[Ansgar Theoderich]], [[Archeembald of Yulash]], [[Barze]], [[Chaku'kawr]], [[Cvaal Daoran]], [[Ector Brahms]], [[Edranka]], [[Ferran Martinez]], [[Gaylyn Wyvernspur]], [[Hargat of the Gray Pestilence]], [[Iyachtu Xvim]], [[Mantor]], [[Maram]], [[Myrkul|Myrkul Bey al-Kursi]] [[Opanrael]], [[Oshikam]], [[Pyricus]], [[Rauklarnemis]], [[Rolf]], [[Talaric Daoran]], [[Trakaulorr]], [[Tyranthraxus]]
